title: Ep 34: Ressentiment with Amber Tozer
description: Ressentiment (French pronunciation: ​[rəsɑ̃timɑ̃]) Nietzsche used this term as the underlying principle to the Geneology of Morals. When one group considers themselves victims of another and justifies their weakness or inactivity because of ressentiment. Amber Tozer and I discuss this idea in it's applications to every day life.
author: nadav@ymhstudios.com (Christina Pazsitzky)
